title: Student Success Story: Sarah Chen
description: Read about how Sarah transitioned from marketing to software development using ClassX courses.

content.data:
Meet Sarah Chen, a former marketing professional who successfully transitioned to software development using ClassX courses.

"I never thought I could learn programming at 32, but ClassX made it possible. The structured curriculum and supportive community helped me land my dream job as a frontend developer."

Sarah's Journey:

• Started with HTML/CSS fundamentals
• Completed JavaScript and React courses
• Built 5 portfolio projects
• Landed a job at a tech startup
• Now mentoring other students

Her advice to new learners: "Start with the basics, practice consistently, and don't be afraid to ask questions in the community forums."
